about_the_game:
Wave Weaver is a high action water combat VR game. Face off against your opponent by creating and manipulating water to become a hurricane on the battlefield. Utilizing the abilities at your disposal, create a fluid arsenal to wreak havoc towards any person who stands in your way. Climbing the ladder to the top!

In Wave Weaver water is formed by gesture based combat. Move your hands in specific ways to generate large volumes. Chain water moves together to create large damaging combos or fortify yourself within ice to withstand your opponent's onslaught.

Water moves consist of the Water Ball, a fast and versatile volume, merge together a couple of these bad boys and you've got yourself a force to be reckoned with.

Utilizing the ability to freeze and unfreeze water at will, create a defensive structure or throw an ice barrage out. Be careful, you cannot control ice, thus unfreezing allows the retaking of volumes.

Take control of passive water by using the redirect move, allowing you to snatch up water out of the air to be utilized once more or to deflect and counter your opponents.

Wave Weaver is currently in development!
